Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.parser

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BanBuilder  
    BanLoader
    Class used to load the Ban File
    BanSerializerSet
    Class used to serialize the Ban in a Gson file
    BonusBarBuilder  
    BonusBarLoader
    Loader for the BonusBar Gson File
    Builder  
    CardBuilder  
    CardLoader
    Loader for the Card File
    ConversionBuilder  
    ConversionLoader
    Loader for the Conversion of Victory Points
    CouncilPositionBuilder  
    FaithPathLoader
    Loader for FaithPoint Path conversion in VictoryPoints
    ImageBuilder  
    ImageLoader
    Loader for all the imager used by the GUI
    LeaderCardBuilder  
    LeaderCardLoader
    Loader for the Leader Cards from json file
    Loader
    Abstract class for a generic loader from a json File
    ParserTest
    This test aims to try all the functionalities of the loader classes in the parser package.
    PositionBuilder  
    PositionLoader
    Class for Loading Position of the Game from json File
    Serializer
    Class for Serialize/Deserialize operations that resolve problems with Abstract classes putting the exact type of the class in the serialization process and extracting that type in the deserialization phase
    TimerBuilder  
    TimerLoader
    Loader for the Game Timers such as move time or next game time
